quote: The humor is essentially dark for a cartoon and sophisticated. But at the same time, being a cartoon gives the writers more freedom than in a normal sitcom. It always pushes the line that, despite human failings, the Simpsons are really decent people.
name: Dan Castellaneta

quote: We need international support so that our people live a life of normality, of dignity, of liberty and freedom. I hope that our cry for freedom may be heard.
name: Mahmoud Abbas

quote: In terms of filming, yes, it really does feel over now. There's a real sense of freedom now. It's a good time to finish, I think. As much as I'm going to miss it I'm ready to move on and do different things.
name: Rupert Grint

quote: Our soldiers have nobly fought to protect freedom since our country's birth, and have fought to protect those that could not protect themselves, even in foreign lands when called upon.
name: John Linder

quote: To stop terrorists before the strike, we must do three things: deny them entry into the country, curtail their freedom of action inside the country, and deprive them of material and moral support from within the country.
name: Richard Perle

quote: I think that we could be more careful about what we're saying to young women in terms of their expectations. It's unrealistic to expect people to always be in designer clothes. Girls growing up deserve more freedom in how they look and how they feel about how they look.
name: Emily Procter

quote: I was the youngest child and got a lot more freedom than my brother and sister. I used to wander, doing my own thing under the radar, but I didn't get in bad, bad trouble.
name: Paul Giamatti

quote: I grew up under Communism so we could only learn Russian, and then when Communism fell in 1989 we could learn a few more things and have the freedom to travel and the freedom of speech - and the freedom of dreaming, really.
name: Petra Nemcova

quote: Now we understand much more clearly. why people from all over the world want to come to New York and to America. It's called freedom.
name: Rudy Giuliani

quote: The balance between freedom and security is a delicate one.
name: Mark Udall

quote: Freedom - an occupied space which must be reoccupied every day.
name: John Ralston Saul

quote: Spirit borrows from matter the perceptions on which it feeds and restores them to matter in the form of movements which it has stamped with its own freedom.
name: Henri Bergson

quote: We live in a land like no other - a land of freedom and opportunity unparalleled on the face of the globe.
name: Bob Taft

quote: We've got to understand that the whole nature of the way American democracy guards its freedom has been changed.
name: John Ashcroft

quote: When public access to voting is impaired or when public confidence in voting is diluted, democracy suffers and our freedom is less secure.
name: DeForest Soaries

quote: If technology has finally caught up with individual liberty, why would anyone who loves freedom want to rethink that?
name: Matt Drudge

quote: I am somebody who... - I'm not saying I'm perfect, but I need that freedom, that ability to make mistakes out there. Because there's a fine line between making a mistake or being brilliant.
name: Tiffeny Milbrett

quote: I am not an anti to anything which will bring freedom to my class.
name: Mary Harris Jones

quote: We are a nation in which freedom is alive in the squares and streets, in the daily work of the communications media, in the open relationship between the governing and the governed.
name: Vicente Fox

quote: If you ask me to summarise our mission, I would put it this way: We were a military regime that sought to lay the foundations for freedom and liberty in a complex society.
name: Ibrahim Babangida

quote: Most importantly, nothing has happened to change my conviction that freedom and the love of liberty remain the essential defining attributes of our national character as a people.
name: Ibrahim Babangida

quote: The challenge as we saw in the Nigerian project was to restructure the economy decisively in the direction of a modern free market as an appropriate environment for cultivation of freedom and democracy and the natural emergence of a new social order.
name: Ibrahim Babangida

quote: While it's really hard to do, at the same time, I'm escaping my body, which I really want to do. I'm living someone else's life. I get very intensely into the story, into the interviews and the research. I'm experiencing things along with my subjects. I have a freedom I don't have in my physical life.
name: Laura Hillenbrand

quote: I've never had anything but the freedom to do what I wanted just as long as it made me happy.
name: Rene Redzepi

quote: Fulfill - you can far more than fulfill - the brightest anticipations of those who, in the name of human freedom, and in the face of threats that have ripened into terrible realities since, fought that battle which placed you where you now stand.
name: Robert Dale Owen

quote: The wretch who lives without freedom feels like dressing in the mud from the streets Those who have you, o Liberty, do not know. you. Those who do not have you should not speak of you, but win you.
name: Jose Marti

quote: I like movies that pop, that have a little bit of candy on, that freedom to have a little bit of extra fun, but are rooted in real behaviour. Rooted in cause and effect, never violating reality.
name: Tony Gilroy

quote: The media bring our wars home, but only rarely have they been able to do it in complete freedom.
name: Bruce Jackson

quote: You make a movie for 9k for the freedom it allows you.
name: Edward Burns

quote: The men and women who serve in our military have won for us every hour we live in freedom, sometimes at the expense of the very hours of the lifetimes they had hoped to live.
name: Bob Riley

quote: Freedom to differ is not limited to things that do not matter mush. That would be a mere shadow of freedom. The test of its substance is the right to differ as to things that touch the heart of the existing order.
name: Robert Jackson

quote: There is a bright spot or two for the Spaniards. French toast has become freedom toast on the Air Force One breakfast menu, but the Spanish omelet is still a Spanish omelet.
name: Suzanne Fields

quote: When I was in jail, I was a lot of people's favorite person. I practically ran the jail. I had more freedom than the police.
name: Flavor Flav

quote: A growing number of young women who have the freedom to decide have decided that career can wait, and the delicious early years of their children's lives can't.
name: Suzanne Fields

quote: People ask me if I ever thought of writing a children's book. I say, 'If I had a serious brain injury I might well write a children's book', but otherwise the idea of being conscious of who you're directing the story to is anathema to me, because, in my view, fiction is freedom and any restraints on that are intolerable.
name: Martin Amis

quote: To me, music has to be about freedom. It's the most important thing in my life.
name: Joss Stone

quote: The very first things that I did, even in theater, were bad guys. They are meaty roles for the most part. With the bad guy you have more freedom to experiment and go further out than with a good guy.
name: Benicio Del Toro

quote: Without economic development, any potential for political openness and freedom will be questionable.
name: Jose Maria Aznar

quote: Our constitutional liberties shall not be sacrificed in our search for greater security, for that is what our enemies and all enemies of freedom and democracy hope to achieve.
name: Tammy Baldwin

quote: The main thing I believe in is freedom.
name: Charles Evers

quote: We must guard against the overreaching hand of big government trying to take away our freedom. And we must always protect the environment in a manner consistent with our values.
name: Steve Forbes

quote: If I am outspoken of the dangers of intemperance to members of our armed forces, it is because we are all especially concerned for the welfare of those who are risking their lives in the cause of freedom.
name: William Lyon Mackenzie King

quote: What is our freedom fight about? Is it about the liberation of children or just having sex with them?
name: Kate Millett

quote: Although we have, in theory, abolished human slavery, recognized women's rights, and stopped child labor, we continue to enslave other species who, if we simply pay attention, show quite clearly that they experience parental love, pain, and the desire for freedom, just as we do.
name: Ingrid Newkirk

quote: Men must stop being jealous of their power and generously allow freedom and responsibility to others. The reward is harmonious families and society.
name: Delphine de Girardin
